name: Lisa Chang
coverLetter: Quality Assurance engineer with 4 years of experience ensuring software quality through comprehensive testing strategies. I specialize in both manual and automated testing, with expertise in test planning, execution, and defect management. My goal is to deliver bug-free software that provides excellent user experience.

profile: QA engineer with expertise in both manual and automated testing across web and mobile platforms.
Experienced in creating comprehensive test plans and executing various testing methodologies.
Strong analytical skills with attention to detail and commitment to software quality.
managementBackground: Led QA initiatives for multiple product releases ensuring zero critical bugs in production.
Mentored junior QA engineers and established testing best practices across teams.
technicalBackground: Proficient in test automation frameworks like Selenium and Cypress.
Experience with API testing, database testing, and performance testing tools.

education.title: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

responsibilities: Developed automated test suites reducing manual testing effort by 70%.
Led testing efforts for 3 major product releases with zero production incidents.
Implemented continuous testing practices in CI/CD pipeline.
Performed manual and automated testing for web and mobile applications.
Created detailed test cases and executed regression testing suites.
Collaborated with development teams to identify and resolve defects.
